name: Microwave Oven Samsung (MG23T5018AN/BW)
origAbout: The Samsung MW5000T Colour Grill Microwave Oven feature a full glass touch panel with a minimalist UX design. It also has a new Grill Fry feature that cooks fried foods without compromising flavour or texture. It also include a Teflon-coated Crusty Plate that is easy to clean, and can be heated up to 200-degree celsius. Quick Defrost allows you to defrost 6 popular foods: Meat, Poulty, Fish, Bread, Cake, Fruit. There is also the Home Dessert function where with a touch of a button, you can make your own homemade desserts. To keep the insides clean, the Samsung Colour Series Grill Microwave Ovens has a ceramic enamel interior that can be cleaned without scrubbing and will not discolour over time. Certified to be 99.9% anti-bacterial, the interior is scratch resistant and resilient against desaturation.
